name: Caturday is today
description:
What would you if you were a cat? Become a photo model of course!

Who doesn't love the cute cat photos?

This game is about a small world of a cat who thinks big. He wants to conquer the world of the social media by his purrfect cute photos.

But he is a picky guy. His mood is up to you but not all the moods will suit all the poses. Be careful to not fail the photo and lose your subscribers.

So, tell me, kitty, can you get all the achievements?

Game made in cooperation with Zoi Fedotova, for Ludum Dare 38,

in 72 hours.

Music and sounds used:

Setuniman https://www.freesound.org/people/Setuniman/sounds/...

LittleRobotSoundFactory https://www.freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundF...

shinephoenixstormcrow https://www.freesound.org/people/shinephoenixstorm...

LS https://www.freesound.org/people/LS/sounds/13658/
